snippet.title: New Mario Kart Deluxe NFGD 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the full presentation at : https://youtu.be/PfKRN1Ejbho
Buoy base galaxy remix by QUMU Music

What is New Mario Kart Deluxe?
NMKDX is a reimagination of Rafa4k's Mario Kart DS Deluxe  made from the ground up using the newest methods and tools that are available in modern MKDS hacking.

What content is 0.0.1 going to have?
0.0.1 is going to have only the courses made for the mushroom cup every single one of them will have their respective encore and reverse mode variations. Part of mission mode will be included too.

Why are you using Custom Tracks that are already on CTGP Nitro?
I made and submitted those custom tracks. They were originally intended for NMKDX.
